name: Winter Queen
text:
Dream sweetly of victory.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: King Maluk
text:
May your victories be infinite.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: Spirit of the Horse
text:
Run wild.

Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, February 2026.

name: End Time
text:
It all ends here.

Obtained by participating in a special event.

name: Roaring Dragon
text:
The bells ring for your victories.

Obtained by participating in a special event.
